title: WiseWays Herbals WiseWays Herbals Detox Bath Crystals 16 oz.
author: Catherine Nelson Licensed Esthetician; Chicago; IL
description: The ocean, mineral baths and hot springs have been used for centuries worldwide. In spas and healing centers today, the use of water therapy is popular once again. DETOX Bath is a unique blend of natural minerals with Dead Sea Salts and herbs created to assist the body in achieving balance.
sitename: WiseWays Herbals Detox Bath Crystals 16 oz.
cleaned_text: Product Details The ocean, mineral baths and hot springs have been used for centuries worldwide. In spas and healing centers today, the use of water therapy is popular once again. DETOX Bath is a unique blend of natural minerals with Dead Sea Salts and herbs created to assist the body in achieving balance. Ingredients Epsom Salt, Sea Salt, Baking Soda, Borax, Dead Sea Salt, Chaparral, Chlorophyll, Yarrow Flower & Malachite Gem Essence. Aura Cacia essential oils are the perfect addition to any skincare routine. aura cacia
